name: Stitching Vector to MicroJson
title: Stitching Vector to MicroJson
description: Convert stitching vectors from text format to microjson.
author: Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Stitching vector directory containing text files

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern used to select stitching vector files

inputs.name: preview
inputs.description: Preview the output files' names without actually running computation

outputs.name: outDir
outputs.description: Stitching vector directory for microjson files

ui.title: Images to correct
ui.description: Stitching vector directory containing text files

ui.title: File pattern
ui.description: Filename pattern used to select stitching vector files

ui.title: Preview Output
ui.description: Preview the output files' names without actually running computation
